txt.en: Get your Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave barter requirements completed here!\n\n'Talk to me one more time, and they're all yours!'
Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave Discovery, Tier 2, 3, and 5 Completion!
By completing this quest, you will automatically complete Discovery: Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave and the Sarch Vorn, the Black Grave, tiers 2, 3, and 5 quests.
